name: 雛菜
text:
透先輩～
首貸してね～！

name: 透
text:
つめたい、指
めっちゃ

name: 雛菜
text:
うん～
でも透先輩の首はあったかいよ～？
trans:
Yup～
But your neck's really warm, y'know～?

name: 小糸
text:
だ、だからって
雛菜ちゃ──

name: 透
text:
ふふっ
いいでしょ

name: 円香
text:
……
首より、あっちの方がよくない？
trans:
...
What if you went for that instead of her neck?

name: 小糸
text:
あ、たいやき……！
屋台来てるんだ……
trans:
Ah, taiyaki...!
The stand's here now...

name: 透
text:
雛菜
首にする？　たいやきにする？
trans:
Hinana.
Want my neck? Or some taiyaki?

name: 雛菜
trans: Hey, what do they mean by "natural"～?

name: 小糸
text:
あ……包み紙に『天然』って
書いてあるね……
trans: Ah... It says "natural" on the wrapper, huh...

name: 小糸
text:
これは天然の鯛で……
養殖の鯛じゃないですって言いたいのかな……？
trans:
Maybe they're saying it's a natural tai bream...
and not from a fish farm...?

name: 透
text:
あ、じゃあ
養殖かも、こっち
trans:
Ah. Then, uh.
Might be from a farm. This one.

name: 小糸
text:
……！
全部、天然じゃないかな……！

name: 透
trans:
There's no life in 'em.
Their eyes.

name: 雛菜
text: それじゃ、雛菜のも養殖かも～
trans: In that case, maybe mine's from a farm too～

name: 透
text:
じゃ、ひと口
小糸ちゃんの
trans:
I'll try a bite of yours, then.
Koito-chan.

name: 小糸
text:
ぴぇ……！
あ、熱いから気を付けて……！

name: 小糸
trans:
S──see...!
Need to... spit it out...?

name: 透
text:
狙ってるのかな
天然のやつ
trans:
Maybe it's aiming for this.
The natural one.

name: 雛菜
text:
あ～
お腹減ってるのか～

name: 円香
text: 変な物、食べさせない方がいいと思うけど
trans: I think it's better we don't feed him anything weird.

name: 小糸
text:
ご、ごめんね……
たいやきは、あげられないんだ……！
trans:
S──sorry...
We can't feed you any taiyaki...!

name: 透
text:
ふふっ
ひとりぼっちなの、おまえ？
trans:
Fufu.
All on your own, buddy?

name: 小糸
text:
あ、透ちゃん……！
だめだよ、あげちゃ……！
trans:
Ah, Toru-chan...!
Watch out, you can't feed it...!

name: 透
text:
大丈夫大丈夫
見てるだけ
trans:
We're good, we're good.
Just taking a look.

name: 雛菜
text:
あは～
飛びつきそう～
trans:
Aha～
Looks like it'd pounce you～

name: 円香
trans: It's live and natural, after all.

name: 透
text:
おーす、この前ぶり
元気そう
trans:
Yooo. Been a bit.
You seem alright.

name: 小糸
text:
あれ
知り合いなの……？
trans:
Huh?
Have you met it before...?

name: 透
text:
よしよし
じゃ、撫でてやろ────
trans:
Good dog.
Alright, I'll pet y────

name: 飼い主
text:
あれ……！
──すみません、うちの子がお邪魔しました……！
trans:
Oh...!
── I'm sorry about my dog, there...!

name: 透
text:
うん
人違いだった

name: 透
trans: has nothing to do with it.

name: 雛菜
text: うなぎって呼んでたよ～？
trans: It was called Unagi, though, right～?

name: 小糸
text:
う、うん……！
天然物かな……！？

name: 小糸
text:
え……！
う、うなぎって言うから────
trans:
Eh...!?
C──cause it's called Unagi and────

name: 円香
text:
……確かに
いきはよかったんじゃない
trans:
...True enough.
It had plenty of life in it, didn't it.

name: 雛菜
text:
あは～
目に勢いがあった～！
trans:
Aha～
Yeah, its eyes were really alive～!

name: 透
text:
さびしいことと
仲良くなれるしね
trans:
You can get along
with stuff that's lonely, after all.
